english.segment1: Together in this place of worship. Your greatness we proclaim. We stand as one in giving You. All glory and acclaim. To You our hearts are open. To You our hands we raise. Come take the place of honour in our lives
english.segment2: Emmanuel. Our God is with us. Prince of Peace Mighty One. The Ever-living God
english.segment3: See the praises of our Saviour. Rise to open skies. With the dawning of redemption. Your glory will arise. For You alone are worthy. Here in Zion you are praised. Our Lord and King forever. You will reign
